attributes.action: Remove all tax incentives and bonuses that property investors currently enjoy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The phenomenal rise in popularity of Buy-to-Let investment and other types of residential investment is a significant contributor to house price inflation.  There is now an obscene divide between people who own property as investment and those priced out of home owner-occupation and the security that brings them and their families.  Tax breaks on property investment only add to this economic disparity and must be removed as a minimum step towards levelling the playing field.

government_responses.details:
